typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SK_goalid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_agoalid as string,
		goalstar as timestamp,
		goalend as timestamp,
		targetmoney as decimal(19,4),
		targetinteger as integer,
		isamount as boolean,
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG
source(output(
		SK_goalid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		goalstar as timestamp,
		goalend as timestamp,
		targetmoney as decimal(19,4),
		targetinteger as integer,
		isamount as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DWH
STG derive(STGHASH = crc32(512,toString(goalstar),toString(goalend),toString(targetinteger),toInteger(toString(targetmoney),'############'))) ~> STGHASH
STGHASH, DWH lookup(STG@SK_goalid == DWH@SK_goalid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(DWH@HASHKEY),
	STGHASH!=DWH@HASHKEY,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_goalid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		goalstar as timestamp,
		goalend as timestamp,
		targetmoney as decimal(19,4),
		targetinteger as integer,
		isamount as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HASHKEY = STGHASH,
		goalstar = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@goalstar,
		goalend = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@goalend,
		targetmoney = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@targetmoney,
		targetinteger = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@targetinteger,
		isamount = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@isamount,
		SK_goalid = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@SK_goalid
	)) ~> sink1
AlterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_goalid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		goalstar as timestamp,
		goalend as timestamp,
		targetmoney as decimal(19,4),
		targetinteger as integer,
		isamount as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SK_goalid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SK_goalid = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@SK_goalid,
		HASHKEY = STGHASH,
		goalstar = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@goalstar,
		goalend = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@goalend,
		targetmoney = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@targetmoney,
		targetinteger = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@targetinteger,
		isamount = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@isamount
	)) ~> sink2
